attributes.action: reject any proposals to tax yachts based on the number of white sails they carry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are a maritime nation with a proud history of exploration, discovery, trade and imperialism. None of this would have been achieved without the freedom to travel the oceans powered by white canvas.
Any attempts to impose taxation on yachts carrying white sails MUST be rejected.
